Summary: The pineapple flavor is a bit too much for me...
text: ...so I drink mine diluted.  These sticks are meant for 16 ounce water bottles, but I empty a stick into a one (1) liter empty bottle which I fill with water from my Mavea water pitcher.  It still tastes heavy on the pineapple; in fact, I don't notice any mango or tea flavors at all. There is a "too sweet" aftertaste, also.
